name: writeJPEGRepresentation(of:to:colorSpace:options:)
desc: Renders the image and exports the resulting image data as a file in JPEG format.
declaration:
func writeJPEGRepresentation(of image: CIImage, 
                          to url: URL, 
                  colorSpace: CGColorSpace, 
                     options: [CIImageRepresentationOption : Any] = [:]) throws
